thread.title: Skipanon recalls canned seafood products over botulism concern
thread.title_full: Skipanon recalls canned seafood products over botulism concern | OregonLive.com

author: Amy Wang | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Skipanon recalls canned seafood products over botulism concern
text:
Skipanon Brand Seafood is recalling all of its canned tuna, salmon, steelhead and sturgeon products because of a possible risk of botulism , a rare but serious paralytic illness that can be fatal.
No illnesses have been reported.
"There hasn't been a detection of any contaminants," Mark Kujala, the Warrenton company's owner and the Warrenton mayor, told The Daily Astorian newspaper on Saturday.
The U.S. Food and Drug Administration flagged the potential contamination during a routine inspection, the newspaper reported.
The company distributed the products to wholesalers and retailers in Oregon, Washington, Nevada and Michigan as well as online. The last distribution date of the recalled products was September 2015.
The products were packed in cans with net weights ranging from 5.5 to 66.5 ounces and have production codes starting with "OC" that can be found on the top or bottom of each can. Customers are being asked to either return the products or hold them for pickup.
Customers with questions can contact Skipanon at 503-861-8277 or recallskipanonbrand@gmail.com .
Here are the recalled products:
• ALBACORE TUNA — Net weight: 48 oz. (1361 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00148 0
• ALBACORE TUNA BELLIES — Net weight: 66.5 oz. (1885 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00145 9
• ALBACORE TUNA — Net weight: 66.5 oz. (1885 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00144 2
• ALBACORE TUNA — Net weight: 6 oz. (170 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00117 6
• SMOKED ALBACORE TUNA — Net weight: 5.5 oz. (156 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00116 9
• CHINOOK SALMON — Net weight: 6 oz. (170 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00118 3
• SMOKED CHINOOK SALMON — Net weight: 5.5 oz. (156 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00112 1
• PEPPERED SMOKED CHINOOK SALMON — Net weight: 5.5 oz. (156 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00114 5
• COHO SALMON — Net weight: 6 oz. (170 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00119 0
• SMOKED COHO SALMON — Net weight: 5.5 oz. (156 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00113 8
• COLUMBIA RIVER SOCKEYE DELUXED HANDFILLED — Net weight: 6 oz. (170 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00120 6 (This label shows Packed by Oregon Ocean Seafoods, the old firm name.)
• SOCKEYE SALMON — Net weight: 6 oz. (170 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00120 6
• SMOKED SOCKEYE SALMON — Net weight: 5.5 oz. (156 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00140 4
• FANCY STEELHEAD — Net weight: 6 oz. (170 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00141 1
• SMOKED STEELHEAD — Net weight: 5.5 oz. (156 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00142 8
• PEPPERED SMOKED STEELHEAD — Net weight: 5.5 oz. (156 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00143 5
• SMOKED STURGEON — Net weight: 5.5 oz. (156 g) — UPC: 6 58071 00111 4
